articles.title: Why Buford is Rude

articles.description: My dog is rude because he kicks down doors when closed and chooses when to listen

articles.description: There are so many reasons, who could even count?

articles.title: Local Boy Unmutes Himself
articles.author: Tim Wit
articles.description: In a stunning turn of events, a very competent programmer remembers to press the 'unmute' button before speaking on Zoom.

articles.description: Breaking: Puff Daddy changes his name yet again, this time to help promote his line of extremely fluffy coats

articles.description: Raffy continues to be a fluffy boy.

articles.title: Another Milestone Reached

articles.description: Chicken Rocks cohort spreads more positivity and knowledge as they complete the toy tale lab with sweeping success.

articles.title: Chicken Rocks Projects
articles.author: Raffy
articles.description: Phase 3 project week is well under way for the Chicken Rocks cohort. In recent news, all groups submitted project pitches after brainstorming with their partners. Stay tuned til Friday to see the results!

articles.title: Zzzzebra
articles.author: Raffy
articles.description: A zebra awoke from its slumber and was curious about a nearby apparatus that we know of as the 'camera'.
